genZ.title: Gen Z表情指南
genZ.subtitle: 通过我们全面的表情指南掌握Gen Z沟通艺术。学习俚语含义、表达方式和有效使用方法。

whatIs.title: 什么是Gen Z？
whatIs.content1: Z世代，通常称为Gen Z，指的是1997年至2012年之间出生的人。这个数字原住民世代发展出了独特的沟通风格，严重依赖表情符号、俚语和网络文化。
whatIs.content2: Gen Z沟通的特点是真实性、创造性和视觉语言的使用。表情符号在表达情感、讽刺和特定于这一世代的文化参考方面发挥着关键作用。

skull.title: 骷髅
skull.meaning: 用来表达"我死了"或极端反应，通常在幽默的语境中使用。

crying.title: 哭泣
crying.meaning: 表达强烈情感，经常讽刺性地使用或表示压倒性的感受。

sparkles.title: 闪光
sparkles.meaning: 为消息增添强调或魔力，经常用来突出重要观点。

cta.title: 准备好掌握Gen Z沟通技巧了吗？
cta.content: 尝试我们的Gen Z表情翻译器和生成器，创建与年轻世代产生共鸣的真实、引人入胜的内容。

clown.title: 小丑
clown.meaning: 用来指出某人的愚蠢行为

authentic.title: 保持真实
authentic.content: Gen Z重视真实、无过滤的沟通。不要试图成为你不是的人。

visual.title: 使用视觉语言
visual.content: 表情符号、GIF和梗图对表达情感和语境至关重要。

quick.title: 保持简洁
quick.content: 简短有力的信息最适合这代人。

humor.title: 拥抱幽默
humor.content: 讽刺、反讽和自嘲幽默很受欢迎。

period.title: 就这样。
period.meaning: 用来强调陈述，类似"故事结束"
period.example: 例子："那套衣服太火了，就这样。"

slay.title: 绝杀
slay.meaning: 做得特别好或看起来很棒
slay.example: 例子："你绝对绝杀了那个演讲！"

noCap.title: 没毛病
noCap.example: 例子："这是最好的电影，没毛病。"

social.title: 社交媒体帖子
social.result1: Gen Z："刚完成锻炼 💪✨ 绝杀了那个有氧运动 🔥"
social.result2: Gen Z："这食物绝对火 🔥 没毛病，最好的一餐 💯"

chat.title: 群聊
chat.result1: Gen Z："💀💀💀 我笑死了，太搞笑了 😭"
chat.result2: Gen Z："事实 💯 没毛病，你绝对正确"

faq.title: 常见问题
faq.q1: 为什么Gen Z使用这么多表情符号？
faq.a1: Gen Z使用表情符号来增添情感语境，表达讽刺，让沟通更有趣和真实。
faq.a2: 保持真实，使用相关表情符号，拥抱当前俚语，不要害怕顽皮和讽刺。
faq.q3: Gen Z和千禧一代沟通的区别是什么？
faq.a3: Gen Z倾向于更直接，使用更多视觉元素，更开放地拥抱讽刺和反讽，重视真实而非完美。
faq.a4: 在社交媒体上关注Gen Z创作者，注意病毒趋势，及时了解时事和流行文化参考。

appDescBold: Emoji Hand (emojihand) is your one-stop tool to instantly turn any text into fun, expressive emoji messages.
appDesc: Emoji Hand是终极AI驱动的表情翻译器和生成器。立即将任何文本转换为富有表现力的表情消息。免费表情翻译、抖音表情、表情包等更多功能！

feature1Desc: Make your messages more lively and engaging on WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, and more.
feature2Desc: Stand out on Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook with creative emoji-powered posts.
feature3Desc: Translate and emoji-fy your text in English, Spanish, French, and more.
user1Quote: Emoji Hand makes my group chats so much more fun!

highlight1Desc: Context-aware emoji translation powered by GPT.

faqTitle: Frequently Asked Questions about Emoji Hand
faq1A: Emoji Hand is an AI-powered tool that instantly adds the most relevant emojis to your text, making your messages more expressive and fun.
faq2A: Yes! You can use normal mode for free. Premium features are available for a small fee.
faq3A: We use OpenAI's GPT to understand your text and add the most relevant emojis based on context and style.
faq4Q: Can I use Emoji Hand on my phone?
faq4A: Absolutely! Emoji Hand is fully responsive and works great on mobile devices.
aboutDesc: Emoji Hand was born from the idea that everyone deserves to express themselves more vividly online. Our mission is to make digital communication more fun, emotional, and creative—one emoji at a time. Whether you’re chatting with friends, posting on social media, or just want to brighten someone’s day, Emoji Hand is here to help!
case1Desc: We use Emoji Hand to make our Slack standups more lively and keep the team spirit high!
case2Desc: Perfect for sending out fun, engaging invitations and reminders with a personal touch.
case3Desc: My followers love the extra flair in my posts—Emoji Hand makes my content pop!
case4Desc: We use Emoji Hand to add fun to our family group chats and celebrate special moments together.

faq.title: 常见问题
faq.lovartComparisonAnswer: 虽然Lovart AI是一个综合设计平台，但我们的表情包生成器专门专注于创建表情包。我们受到Lovart AI驱动方法的启发，并将类似的原则应用到表情包创建中。
faq.imageFormatsAnswer: 我们支持JPG、PNG和GIF格式。为了获得最佳效果，请使用具有清晰主题的高质量图片。
faq.generationCount: 我可以生成多少个表情包？
faq.generationCountAnswer: 每次生成会根据您选择的风格和上传的图片创建3-5个不同的表情包变体。
faq.commercialUse: 我可以商业使用这些表情包吗？
faq.commercialUseAnswer: 是的，所有生成的表情包都可以免费用于个人和商业目的。它们是使用受Lovart AI原则启发的AI技术创建的。

emojiGenerator.lovartDescription: Lovart AI是一个革命性的AI设计代理，可以自动化整个设计过程，从概念到图像、视频、3D等。我们的表情包生成器受到Lovart AI驱动创意工具的创新方法的启发。
emojiGenerator.lovartDescription2: 就像Lovart AI一样，我们的表情包生成器允许您上传图像并让AI创建具有不同风格的多种变体，使创作过程变得轻松愉快。
emojiGenerator.lovartPrinciples: 受Lovart AI启发的设计原则
emojiGenerator.howToUse: 如何使用我们的Lovart风格表情包生成器
emojiGenerator.uploadStep: 上传您想要转换为表情包的任何图像。我们的AI将分析内容并创建变体。
emojiGenerator.styleStep: 从6种不同风格中选择：可爱、搞笑、酷炫、毒舌、GenZ或TikTok。每种风格都创建独特的变体。
emojiGenerator.generateStep: AI生成多个表情包变体。下载单个包或在您的项目中使用它们。

q1.title: 什么是抖音表情？
q1.answer: 抖音表情是用户可以在抖音平台的评论、标题和消息中使用的自定义表情符号字符和隐藏短代码的集合。这些包括标准Unicode表情符号和可以通过短代码（如

q2.title: 如何使用抖音表情？

q4.title: 抖音表情与普通表情符号相同吗？

q5.title: 我可以在其他平台上使用抖音表情吗？
q5.answer: 抖音的隐藏表情符号（通过短代码访问）是抖音平台特有的，在其他社交媒体平台上不会按预期显示。但是，标准Unicode表情符号在所有平台上都可以使用。

tiktok.emojis.page.subtitle: Discover all TikTok emojis including hidden shortcodes like [smile], [happy], [loveface]. Learn how to use TikTok emojis, their meanings, and get the complete list of official TikTok emoji codes.
tiktok.emojis.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About TikTok Emojis
tiktok.emojis.faq.a1: TikTok emojis are a collection of custom emoji characters and hidden shortcodes that users can use in comments, captions, and messages on the TikTok platform. These include both standard Unicode emojis and TikTok-specific hidden emojis that can be accessed through shortcodes like [smile], [happy], and [loveface].
tiktok.emojis.faq.q2: How do I use TikTok emojis?
tiktok.emojis.faq.a2: To use TikTok emojis, simply type the shortcode in square brackets (e.g., [smile]) in your comment or caption. TikTok will automatically convert these shortcodes into the corresponding emoji. You can also use standard emoji keyboards or copy-paste emojis directly.
tiktok.emojis.faq.q3: What are the most popular TikTok emojis?
tiktok.emojis.faq.a3: Some of the most popular TikTok emojis include [smile], [happy], [loveface], [wronged], [cry], [laugh], [cool], [angry], and [surprised]. These emojis are frequently used in comments and captions to express emotions and reactions.
tiktok.emojis.faq.q4: Are TikTok emojis the same as regular emojis?
tiktok.emojis.faq.a4: TikTok supports both standard Unicode emojis (like 😂, ❤️, 🔥) and its own custom hidden emojis accessed through shortcodes. The hidden emojis have a unique visual style that's consistent across all devices and platforms.
tiktok.emojis.faq.q5: Can I use TikTok emojis on other platforms?
tiktok.emojis.faq.a5: TikTok's hidden emojis (accessed via shortcodes) are specific to the TikTok platform and won't display as intended on other social media platforms. However, standard Unicode emojis work across all platforms.

intro.title: 什么是抖音表情？
intro.p1: 抖音表情是用户可以在抖音平台的评论、标题和消息中使用的自定义表情符号字符和隐藏短代码的独特集合。与标准表情符号不同，抖音有自己的"隐藏表情"系统，允许用户通过短代码访问特殊表情符号字符。
intro.p2: 这些隐藏表情符号通过在方括号中键入特定短代码来访问，例如
intro.p2_3: 当您在抖音评论或标题中键入这些短代码时，它们会自动转换为相应的自定义表情图形。
intro.p3: 抖音支持所有平台原生表情符号，但这些隐藏表情符号提供了独特的视觉风格，在所有设备和平台上保持一致，使其在抖音用户中很受欢迎，用于表达特定的情感和反应。

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy applies to all users of Emoji Hand (hereinafter referred to as 'the Website' or 'we'). We are committed to protecting your personal information and privacy.

Account information such as membership status, quota, usage records
Payment information (processed by third-party platforms such as Creem; we do not store your card information)
Site access logs, device information, browser information, etc.
privacy.list2: For authentication, membership services, quota management
For product improvement and statistical analysis
To send you important notifications, service changes, event information, etc.
privacy.list3: We use Clerk for user authentication, subject to Clerk's privacy policy
We use Creem for payments, subject to Creem's privacy policy
We may integrate third-party analytics tools (such as Google Analytics)
privacy.security: We take reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
privacy.list5: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information
To delete your account or exercise other rights, please contact us via the customer support email at the bottom of the page
privacy.contact: For any privacy-related questions, please contact us via the customer support email shown at the bottom of the page.
privacy.change: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Emoji Hand (hereinafter referred to as 'this website' or 'we'). Please read these terms carefully before using the website. By using the website, you agree to all the terms.
list1: This website provides users with digital services such as AI emoji translation, membership services, and quota management.
Some features are only available to members, and regular users have a daily free quota limit.
list2: Users must comply with national laws and regulations and must not use the website for illegal activities.
Users must not upload or transmit illegal, infringing, or inappropriate content.
Users should properly safeguard their account information and are responsible for losses caused by account leakage.
list3: Membership services are paid subscriptions. Members enjoy higher daily quotas and more features during the validity period.
After membership expires, users are downgraded to regular users, and the quota is restored to the regular level.
Quotas are reset daily, and member quotas differ from regular user quotas.
list4: All payments are processed by third-party platforms (such as Creem), and we do not store your payment card information.
Membership services are digital goods and are non-refundable after purchase, except in special circumstances. Please contact customer service email.
list5: This website strives to provide stable services but does not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service.
The website is not responsible for service interruptions, data loss, etc., caused by force majeure or third-party reasons.
terms.dispute: For disputes arising from these terms of service, both parties should resolve them amicably. If negotiation fails, you may file a lawsuit in the court where the website operator is located.
terms.contact: For any service-related questions, please contact us via the customer support email shown at the bottom of the page.
terms.change: We reserve the right to modify these terms of service based on actual circumstances. Changes will be announced on this page, and continued use will be deemed acceptance of the changes.

terms.list9: It is strictly forbidden to upload, distribute, or generate any pornographic, violent, hateful, discriminatory, fraudulent, malicious software, privacy-infringing, intellectual property-infringing, or illegal content.
If such behavior is detected, the platform reserves the right to suspend or terminate the account and cooperate with relevant authorities for investigation.
terms.section10: Age Restriction and Protection of Minors
terms.list10: This service is only available to users aged 16 and above. Minors must use the service with the consent of their guardians.
If you are a minor, please read and use this service under the guidance of your guardian.
terms.list11: Users may request deletion or export of their personal data at any time via the settings page or customer support email. The platform will process such requests within a reasonable time frame.
autoRenewNote: Membership is auto-renewing. You can cancel your subscription at any time on the payment platform. After cancellation, membership benefits remain until the end of the current billing period.
accessibilityContent: This website is committed to providing an accessible experience for all users, including people with disabilities. If you have accessibility suggestions, please contact us via the support email.
copyrightContent: Emoji Hand and its logo are owned by emojihand.com. Some content, fonts, or icons may be from third parties and are copyrighted by their respective owners. Unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution of this website's content is prohibited.
